title: 12 Crepe Recipes That Make Brunch a Big Deal
description: Make brunch an easy and elegant affair with these flavorful crepe recipes.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 12 Crepe Recipes That Make Brunch a Big Deal By Rai Mincey Published on March 3, 2021 Close Credits: Buckwheat Queen Brunch should be an easy and elegant affair, and these flavorful crepe recipes illustrate the versatility and beauty of adding these delicate, pancake-like wraps to your arsenal. From a peppery Cajun shrimp crepe to a fragrant honey and orange offering, you're sure to find your favorite way to make brunch the highlight of the weekend. Discover your crepe of choice from among these twelve tasty brunch crepe recipes. 01 of 12 Shrimp and Scallop Crepes View Recipe Save lutzflcat Take a deep-sea dive into brunch with these silky, flavorful shrimp and scallop crepes. Sherry, green onions, and mushrooms provide sharpness and depth to this creamy brunch dish. 02 of 12 Chicken Crepe Riviera View Recipe Save These mouthwatering crepes are stuffed with vinegar-marinated chicken and topped with a luxurious mixture of heavy cream, pesto, and portobello mushrooms. 03 of 12 Hot Mexican Bean Crepes View Recipe Save Pinto beans, sweet corn, and shredded Monterrey Jack cheese are nestled in light, soft layers of dough. This recipe gets its unique kick from ground ginger and a potent dose of chili powder. 04 of 12 Breakfast Crepes with Ham, Vegetables, and Egg View Recipe Save Caitlin Perszyk A traditional breakfast all wrapped up in a delightfully crisp crepe pocket. "Delicious and relatively easy, " says home cook James Rogan. "Would recommend to cook in oven for longer depending on how well done you like your eggs." Our Top 20 Brunch Recipes of All Time 05 of 12 Cajun Shrimp Crepes View Recipe Save thedailygourmet Louisiana flavors get the ultimate crepe treatment in this perfectly seasoned recipe. Succulent shrimp, chopped bell peppers, and garlic make up the filling, while the entire crepe is slathered with a cream-based Cajun sauce. 06 of 12 Squash Blossom Crepes (Crepas de Flor de Calabaza) View Recipe Save Buckwheat Queen "Excellent recipe for the advanced palate," says home cook auriwann. "The fresh epazote adds an amazing, authentic taste to this dish. I add a bit more manchego than is called for (about enough to cover the top). Well worth the extra effort to make!" 07 of 12 Gluten-Free Butter Crepes with Orange Blossom Honey Butter View Recipe Save Allrecipes Community Add a hint of sweetness to your brunch with these delicate and fragrant crepes. Orange blossom honey and orange zest gives this dish a bright, satisfying tang. High-quality butter is a must for this decadent crepe recipe. 08 of 12 Pumpkin Crepes with Fontina Cheese Sauce View Recipe Save Photo by Kim's Cooking Now. Kim's Cooking Now An elegant crepe with a comforting cheesiness that everyone will love. Diced pumpkin and leeks combine for a smooth, buttery filling while shredded fontina is baked until melted on top. 09 of 12 Cheese Torte with Chicken and Mushroom View Recipe Save This impressive layered crepe dish is filled with fresh, creamy flavor. Chicken, fresh dill, garlic, and cream cheese come together for some serious flavor. Wow your brunch guests with a Russian crepe recipe that's perfect for special occasions. 10 of 12 Savory Western Crepes View Recipe Save lutzflcat "You'll have all the awesome flavors of a Denver omelet tucked inside a flavorful crepe," says recipe creator lutzflcat. "Garnish with salsa, sour cream, and additional Cheddar cheese." 11 of 12 Banh Xeo (Vietnamese Crepes) View Recipe Save bd.weld A shrimp-studded crepe dish that also features minced shallot, mung bean sprouts, and fresh lettuce. Turmeric-tinged rice flour crepes have incredible color and flavor that pairs perfectly with the mulitifaceted filling. 12 of 12 Ham and Cheese Crepes View Recipe Save lutzflcat The classic pairing of ham and cheese is right at home in the cozy tuck of a crepe. Dijon mustard, Gruyere cheese, and extra butter add to the savory smoothness of each bite. https://www.allrecipes.com/recipes/147/breakfast-and-brunch/crepes/ Explore more: Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Crepes Savory Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback! Tell us why!
